attributes.action: give the British public the opportunity to vote on the acceptability of the European Constitition as promised
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government promised to allow British voters to vote in a referendum on whether Britain would sign up to the European Constition. Currently we are hearing talk that this will be signed up to by the Prime Minister Mr Tony Blair without recourse to the British voters and this is singularly unfair on the voters of this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
